channel.title: Caribbean Airlines on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Caribbean Airlines on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Caribbean Brief: Mottley's Three-Peat, US Visa Crackdowns, and Airlines in Chaos
item.description: Barbados heads to polls February 11, Caribbean faces stricter US visa rules, and airlines are cutting routes left and right.

item.title: Caribbean Brief: Barbados Election Feb 11, Trinidad PM Kamla Navigates CARICOM, Caribbean Airlines Restructures
item.description: PM Mottley calls snap election for February 11 seeking historic third term, Trinidad’s Kamla Persad-Bissessar defends CARICOM stance, and Caribbean Airlines closes its Barbados hub.
